I need to review my artisanal soap making workspace - I have a batch of lavender chamomile bars to unmold today

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731117000000_s5o6a7p8m", "workspaceId": "ws_1731117000000_s1o2a3p4m", "sessionDescription": "Cold-process soap making business - artisanal bar soap with natural ingredients, selling online via Etsy shop and local craft fairs", "sessionMemory": "Week 28 of soap business. Current inventory: 165 bars across 8 scents (lavender, peppermint eucalyptus, coffee exfoliant, honey oatmeal, rose clay, charcoal tea tree, lemon verbena, sweet orange). Production setup: dedicated soap kitchen, 48-bar log mold, individual cavity molds, curing racks (6-week cure time minimum). Formulation: palm-free recipes using olive, coconut, shea, castor oils. Safety: lye handling protocols, proper ventilation, PPE. Sales: Etsy shop (112 orders, 4.9 stars), 3 craft fairs monthly. Revenue: $3,840 total ($680 this month). Learning: advanced swirl techniques, fragrance blending, label design, photography for listings. Current batch: 48 bars lavender chamomile (poured 2 days ago, ready to unmold and cut today).", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to unmold and cut lavender chamomile batch, plan next production run", "primaryGoal": "Build sustainable soap business with $2K monthly revenue, expand to wholesale accounts, perfect signature formulations", "subgoal": "Unmold and cut 48-bar lavender batch today, photograph for new listings, plan Valentine's collection (3 new romantic scents)"}, "id": "ws_1731117000000_s1o2a3p4m"}
